00025 void TeamModeAi::Process(Player* player)
00026 {
00027     const Player::Array players = m_playManager->GetTargetsOf(player);
00028     const Item::Array& items = m_playManager->map.items;
00029     const DynamicObject::Array& dynamicObjects = m_playManager->map.dynamicObjects;
00030 
00031     Vector3f addForce;
00032     Vector3f playerPos = player->GetPos();
00033 
00034     // Test de collision avec la map
00035 
00036     //    const StaticObject::Array& staticObjects = m_playManager->map.staticObjects;
00037     //
00038     //    bool isCollidWithMap = false;
00039     //
00040     //    for(unsigned i = 0; i < staticObjects.size(); i++)
00041     //        if(isCollidWithMap = player->GetPhysicBody()->IsCollidWith(staticObjects[i]->GetPhysicBody()))
00042     //            break;
00043 
00044     // Recherche d'item
00045 
00046     m_targetOtp = NULL;
00047 
00048     for(unsigned i = 0; i < dynamicObjects.size(); i++)
00049     {
00050         if(dynamicObjects[i]->GetPos() - playerPos < m_aiParams.dynamicInteraction)
00051             m_targetOtp = dynamicObjects[i];
00052     }
00053 
00054     for(unsigned i = 0; i < items.size(); i++)
00055     {
00056         if(items[i]->IsNeeded(player))
00057         {
00058             m_targetOtp = items[i];
00059             break;
00060         }
00061     }
00062 
00063     // Priorité aux items
00064     if(m_targetOtp)
00065     {
00066         addForce = m_targetOtp->GetPos();
00067     }
00068 
00069     else
00070     {
00071         // Mete a jour la position de la cible
00072         if(m_targetPlayer)
00073             m_targetPos = m_targetPlayer->GetPos();
00074 
00075         // Recherche d'une nouvelle cible
00076         // Si Temps écouler
00077         // || Trop pres
00078         // || Pas de cible
00079         // || La cible est mort
00080         if(m_switchTarget.IsEsplanedTime(m_aiParams.switchTargetTime)
00081            || m_strikePos - playerPos < m_minDistToSwith
00082            || !m_targetPlayer
00083            || m_targetPlayer->IsKilled())
00084         {
00085             Vector3f minDist = m_mapAABB.max - m_mapAABB.min;
00086 
00087             for(unsigned i = 0; i < players.size(); i++)
00088 
00089                 if(!players[i]->IsKilled() && m_mapAABB.IsInner(players[i])
00090                    && players[i]->IsVisibleFromIA())
00091                 {
00092                     Vector3f testedDist = players[i]->GetPos() - playerPos;
00093 
00094                     if(testedDist < minDist)
00095                     {
00096                         minDist = testedDist;
00097                         m_targetPlayer = players[i];
00098                     }
00099                 }
00100 
00101             if(m_targetPlayer)
00102             {
00103                 m_targetPos = m_targetPlayer->GetPos();
00104 
00105                 // Recherche d'une position d'attack
00106                 do
00107                     m_strikePos = tools::rand(m_targetPos - m_strikPrimiter,
00108                                               m_targetPos + m_strikPrimiter);
00109                 while(!m_mapAABB.IsInner(m_strikePos));
00110 
00111                 m_strikePos.y = 0;
00112             }
00113         }
00114 
00115         addForce = m_strikePos;
00116     }
00117 
00118     // Routine d'attack
00119     if(m_targetPlayer && m_targetPos - playerPos < m_minDistToShoot)
00120     {
00121         Vector3f targetPos = m_targetPos;
00122 
00123         if(m_targetPlayer == m_playManager->GetUserPlayer()
00124            && m_playManager->GetBullettime()->IsActive())
00125         {
00126             Vector3f velocity;
00127             NewtonBodyGetVelocity(m_targetPlayer->GetPhysicBody()->GetBody(), velocity);
00128 
00129             targetPos = m_targetPos - velocity;
00130         }
00131 
00132         if(m_gustCount < m_aiParams.shootGustCount)
00133         {
00134             Vector3f margin = tools::rand(AABB(m_aiParams.shootAccuracy));
00135             if(player->Shoot(m_targetPos + margin))
00136                 m_gustCount++;
00137         }
00138         else if(m_gustClock.IsEsplanedTime(m_aiParams.shootGustTime))
00139             m_gustCount = 0;
00140     }
00141 
00142     if((AABB(-1, 1) + m_lastPos).IsInner(player)
00143        && m_lastPosClock.IsEsplanedTime(2000))
00144     {
00145         do
00146         {
00147             m_strikePos = tools::rand(m_playManager->map.aabb);
00148             m_strikePos.y = 1;
00149             m_strikePos = m_playManager->parallelscene.newton->FindFloor(m_strikePos);
00150         }
00151         while(m_strikePos.y < m_playManager->map.aabb.min.y);
00152 
00153         addForce = m_strikePos;
00154     }
00155     else
00156         m_lastPos = playerPos;
00157 
00158     // Changement d'arme
00159     if(player->GetCurWeapon()->IsEmpty())
00160         player->SwitchUpWeapon();
00161 
00162     // Mouvement
00163     addForce = (addForce - playerPos).Normalize() * m_worldSettings.playerMoveSpeed;
00164     addForce.y = 0;
00165 
00166     player->GetPhysicBody()->SetApplyForce(addForce);
00167 }
